title: quarkus-integration-test-liquibase-mongodb fails in native with latest GraalVM 22.3-dev build
body:
### Describe the bug

`liquibase-mongodb` quarkus integration test fails with latest GraalVM CE dev build in native mode with:

```

```

### Expected behavior

Native image build works.

### Actual behavior

Native image build fails with: `java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator`

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce:

1. Download the latest 22.3.0-dev GraalVM CE build. For example from here: https://github.com/graalvm/graalvm-ce-dev-builds/releases/tag/22.3.0-dev-20220805_1946
2. Use it as `GRAALVM_HOME`
3. Run the `liquibase-mongodb` integration test:
```
pushd integration-tests
../mvnw --fae -pl 'liquibase-mongodb' -Dnative -Dtest-containers -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=true -Dstart-containers -Dnative.surefire.skip -Dformat.skip -Dno-descriptor-tests  -Dlog.level=ALL clean verify
popd
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11 or 17 based GraalVM (doesn't matter)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

22.3.0-dev

### Quarkus version or git rev

dc51ebc7ea34339b43139cd16bf8ac4d44ef868a

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

This seems to be related to this GraalVM change:
https://github.com/oracle/graal/commit/ce3d101fba368cdb4bd8eebad770e5c59c8aa57a

A similar issue with `redis-client` IT is: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/27211
